title: How to Make Milk Punch

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes.
Measure and pour the crème de cacao and milk.
Pour the bourbon into the cocktail shaker.
Shake well.
steps.description: When condensation appears on the sides of the shaker, you'll know that the drink is mixed thoroughly.

steps.headline: Serve in a goblet or cocktail glasses.

text: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes.  Measure and pour the crème de cacao and milk.  Pour the bourbon into the cocktail shaker.  Shake well. When condensation appears on the sides of the shaker, you'll know that the drink is mixed thoroughly. Serve in a goblet or cocktail glasses.  Finished.
